CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The UV - vis absorption spectra of PffBB-n ( n = 10 , 12 , 14 , or 16 ) measured in chlorobenzene at different temperatures and in thin films are shown in Figure 1.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the Material Name entities in the given paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |
| Chlorobenzene |

Note that "PffBB-n" is a single material name, and the different values of "n" (10, 12, 14, or 16) are not separate material names, but rather variations of the same material.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid Material Name entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |
| Chlorobenzene |

Sure, here are the valid entities that clearly refer to material properties in the given paragraph:

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as "chlorobenzene" and "temperature", are not material properties and have been removed from the list.
